author: leobago
content: Hey! I think we pretty much got everything. The second poll had more votes than the first one, the star chosen is Heze. The two winning Portmanteau options at the moment are Hezot치 and Hegot치, which are both very close to the one winning in the previous poll (Hekot치). So basically at this point the incertude has been reduced to one single charater ('z' or 'g'). I think we can make a last call for votes today, and set the winner tonight. 游뗵

author: leobago
content: Added the pronunciation in the EM post and some extra info. It looks like the Portmanteau will be **Hegot치**
